entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:47 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 03:30 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing drizzle or drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or a few flurries changing to freezing drizzle or flurries this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries or a few rain showers in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 27 March 2023
